Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to exceed expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $150 by us due to its unique features and high-quality materials. Given its worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending this opportunity to you for $130. I believe this price reflects both the value of the product and provides you with an excellent opportunity to acquire something truly special. Please let me know if you're interested in exploring this further. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $130. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $130
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
